item.title: #12 - Immediate Tasks
item.description: Who wrote military regulations? The very bluebook of “Regulations for the Order and Discipline of the Troops.” I am pretty sure there is an author or a group of authors to that. But I truly believe that life is the true author of military regulations. Salty sweat and sticky blood of the soldiers seal all the chapters of the book. Same with “The Rules”, â€” life is the true author of it.
